newsitem.title: UK: Guinness spirits arm in Uruguay joint venture.
newsitem.headline: Guinness spirits arm in Uruguay joint venture.

text.p: United Distillers, the spirits arm of Guinness Plc, said on Wednesday it had formed a joint venture in Uruguay with Carrau S.A.
The joint venture, called United Distillers Carrau S.A., directly controls the distribution of its key brands in the country and will start trading in April 1997.

UDC will exclusively sell and distribute the Scotch Whisky portfolio of Johnnie Walker Red, Black, Gold and Blue Label, Swing, Cardhu, White Horse, VAT69 and Logan along with Gordon's and Tanqueray gins.
Distribution arrangements for the rest of UD's brands in Uruguay will remain unchanged.
Uruguay is an important market for UD with Latin America the third largest profit contributor for the company.
